articles.title: Dinosaur fossil from day extinction asteroid hit earth, scientists claim - Business Insider
articles.description: Dinosaur fossils found at Tanis in North Dakota are believed to date back to the mass extinction event when an asteroid struck 66 million years ago.
articles.content:
Scientists claim to have found a fossil of a dinosaur killed on the day an extinction asteroid struck the Earth 66 million years ago.
